//Non-Animated:
//    GrhIndex = Frames - FileNumber - X - Y - Width - Height
//Animated:
//    GrhIndex = Frames - GrhIndex - For - Each - Frame... - Speed
//Speed is 10000 / x per frame, so on 6 frames at 80, it is 125ms/frame, and 1000ms total
